department.en: MSc in Hydrologocal and  Oceanic Sciences
department.ch: 水文與海洋科學研究所碩士班

goal.en: “This course was designed to provide students with a broad coverage of numerical methods applied for solving engineering and scientific problems. Fundamental knowledge of numerical computing, finite difference method, and finite element method will be included with demonstrated examples. Basic principles, solution procedures, and performances, including both efficiency and accuracy, of each method will be emphasized. Applications of numerical methods can be practiced through assigned homeworks. The capability of computer programming is essentially required for each student in this course to implement the materials given in lectures for practices.“
goal.ch: 本課程涵蓋面對工程或科學問題所需之入門與進階之常用數值方法與技巧。基本之數值計算、有限差分與有限元素法等皆會有深入淺出之講解，並透過作業練習提升學生程式語言編寫能力與對所講授方法之深入了解。透過此全面性課程，學生將可精進程式語言能力與數值計算技巧，以利後續進階研究所需。

content.en:
0. Numerical Computing and Computers
1. Solving Nonlinear Equations
2. Solving Sets of Equations
3. Interpolation and Curve Fitting
4. Numerical Differentiation and Numerical Integration
5. Initial-Value Problems
6. Boundary-Value Problems
content.ch:
0. 數值計算與計算機
1. 求解非線性方程式
2. 求解聯立方程組
3. 數據內插與曲線擬合
4. 數值微分與數值積分
5. 求解初始值問題
6. 求解邊界值問題

textbook.en:
“1.“Applied Numerical Analysis” by C. F. Gerald and P. O. Wheatley, 7th ed., Addison Wesley Longman, 2003.
2. ““Applied Numerical Methods for Engineers and Scientists” by S. S. Rao, Prentice Hall, 2002.
3. “Numerical Analysis” by R. L. Burden and J. D. Faires, 7th ed., Watworth, 2001.
4.“Numerical Solution of Partial Differential Equations: Finite Difference Methods” by G.D. Smith, 3rd ed., Oxford University Press, 1985.
5.“Applied Finite Element Analysis” by L. J. Segerlind, 2nd ed., John Wiley and Sons, 1984.“
